experiences.title: Software Development Engineer
experiences.description: Refined data processing in model build and analysis pipeline, transforming raw data into inferred values with comprehensive automated unit and integration testing. Optimized system scalability through time complexity improvements, enhancing overall performance. Troubleshot and resolved model build pipeline failures in staging and production environments using CloudWatch logs. Streamlined and automated DevOps processes by restructuring CI/CD workflows with GitHub Actions. Implemented data export/import functionality for timeseries data purge and restore, improving database efficiency and data lifecycle management.
experiences.reasoning: This role is clearly stated in the work experience section, detailing responsibilities and technical skills used.

experiences.title: Software Development Engineer
experiences.description: Implemented OFSAA LLFP fintech solutions in SIT, UAT and provided post-implementation support in Production environments for 2 international financial banking firms. Engineered 6 GUI based workflow runs for ETL pipelines with numerous tasks and integrated them with backend scripts to process data from Pre-staging to end-user report generation stage. Enhanced UI for Individual Assessment (IA) module based on XML Forms Framework by customizing 4 UI Forms and 8 PL/SQL scripts to process over 300k customer records. Generated PL/SQL scripts for data manipulation and validation to automate manual tasks for filtering source data that helped reduce execution times by 20% while generating end-user reports.
experiences.reasoning: The role is explicitly mentioned, and detailed tasks and technologies involved are listed, marking significant contributions and skills acquired.

experiences.title: Embedded C++ Developer
experiences.description: Worked under Dr. Joby Antony, Formerly Visiting Scientist, CERN, Geneva. Designed software modules for ARM Cortex-M3 embedded server sensor device to measure subzero temperatures. Troubleshooted bugs and optimized the system to handle real-time sensor data via RPC transfer protocols.
experiences.reasoning: Even though this experience is less formal, it provides insights into applied programming and problem-solving skills.

experiences.title: Python Developer
experiences.description: Worked under the guidance of Ms. Vanita Agarwal, Assistant Professor. Successfully modeled discrete mathematical Rough Set Theory concepts for Sensor Data Mining using Python. Designed custom-built library to process 65,536 objects in 2 minutes with accuracy of 95% using linear regression.
experiences.reasoning: The freelance nature of this experience might not officially qualify as employment, but it involved significant development work relevant to the candidate's skills.

experiences.title: Graduate Services Assistant
experiences.company: Ira A. Fulton Schools of Engineering at Arizona State University
experiences.description: Grader for CSE 536 Advanced Operating Systems course. Prepared and reviewed coursework, assisted students during office hours, and graded assignments.
experiences.reasoning: Although short-term and academic in nature, this role involves skills in education, grading, and supporting a learning environment.
